ACCEPTED_LEGAL_GOODS.message: Thank you. You know a good deal when you see one!

ACCEPTED_RESCUE.message: Thank you very much. The crew will appreciate that.

ADTEXT_ILLEGAL_GOODS.message: EASY MONEY: Valuable information for sale

ADTEXT_LEGAL_GOODS.message: INFORMATION FOR SALE: Knowing the location of a debris field with valuable cargo

ADTEXT_RESCUE.message: HELP NEEDED for a rescue operation

FAILURE_MSG_ARMS_DEALER.message: You fool. The client's not gonna like this! Good luck, loser!

HOW_MUCH_TIME.message: How much time do I have?

HOW_MUCH_TIME_ARMS_DEALER.message: My business partner is in orbit around {star} to avoid detection. It would be great if you could reach him before {date}.

HOW_MUCH_TIME_ILLEGAL_GOODS.message: Don't waste time. Only the early bird catches the worm!

HOW_MUCH_TIME_LEGAL_GOODS.message: I don't know. But if I were you, I would be quick!

HOW_MUCH_TIME_RESCUE.message: It would be desirable if you could reach the location before {date}.

INTROTEXT_ARMS_DEALER.message: {client} scoop container at {star} and deliver to ship {shipid}. Pay {cash}

INTROTEXT_ILLEGAL_GOODS.message: Hey buddy, I know about a debris field with illegal goods. The police caught a smuggler close to {star}. They haven't had time to clean up the area yet. If you are quick, you can make easy money! I can give you the coordinates. It only costs you {cash}. Don't let the chance slip by!

INTROTEXT_LEGAL_GOODS.message: Hello my friend. I'm {client}. I heard about a cargo hauler that got into trouble near {star} because of bad ship maintenance. Amazing who gets to fly a spaceship these days, isn't it? Anyway, this stupid had to dump a lot of the cargo. If you're quick, you can grab the cargo very easily! This info is as good as new! I'll sell you the coordinates for lousy {cash}. What do you say?

INTROTEXT_RESCUE.message: Hi, my name is {client}. The crew of a freighter had to abandon their ship after an incident. The owner of the ship does not want the information to be made public and is willing to pay {cash} for a rescue mission. The accident site is near {star}. Please pick up the crew and bring them to a station!

REPEAT_THE_REQUEST.message: Could you please repeat the request?

SHIP_DESTROYED.message: Oh no. {shipid} has been destroyed. Deliver the cargo to {station} now!

WHY_NOT_YOURSELF.message: Why don't you do it yourself?

WHY_NOT_YOURSELF_ARMS_DEALER.message: The local authorities are watching me! I have to keep a low profile for a few weeks.

WHY_NOT_YOURSELF_ILLEGAL_GOODS.message: I'm just an office clerk. I don't own a ship.

WHY_NOT_YOURSELF_RESCUE.message: I have no ship available at this time.

YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_A_SCOOP.message: Sorry, you do not have a cargo scoop.
